div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 736 Pamidovo, Pazardzik district, Bul- garia, 1962 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: many AR Philip II: tetradr. Thracian Chersonese: hemidr. Parium: hemidr. Disposition: Pazardzik 1 Philip, 4 Thracian Chers., 1 Parium Gerasimov, BIAB 27 (1964), p. 239
